title: How to Change the Autosave Frequency in Prison Architect

steps.headline: Launch Prison Architect.
steps.description: You can use the shortcut on your desktop, launch it via Steam, or however you usually start up the game.

steps.headline: Once the game has started, open up the 'Main Menu.'
steps.description: You can usually open it by using the Esc button on your keyboard.

steps.headline: Edit the frequency.
steps.description: You can put in 5 minutes, or even 50 minutes! The default setting is every 10 minutes.

steps.headline: Click the 'Apply' button to save your changes.

text: Launch Prison Architect. You can use the shortcut on your desktop, launch it via Steam, or however you usually start up the game. Once the game has started, open up the 'Main Menu.' You can usually open it by using the Esc button on your keyboard. Select 'Options.  Select 'Game.'  Edit the frequency. You can put in 5 minutes, or even 50 minutes! The default setting is every 10 minutes. Click the 'Apply' button to save your changes.
